analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 21.28. Hetuduka, Parittārammaṇattika🔽Nahetuṁ naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nahetuṁ namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu duka paritta ārammaṇa ttika  na hetum na paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca hetu paritta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na hetum na mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā hetu mahaggata ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The Numerical Lists in the Chapter on Conditions🔽With a condition that is not a root cause and that has a limited object as condition there arises an element that is a root cause and that has a limited object. (In brief.) With a root cause there are three. … With an unobscured neutral element there are three.🔽With a condition that is not a root cause and that has a great object as condition there arises an element that is a root cause and that has a great object. (In brief.) With a root cause there are three. … With an unobscured neutral element there are three.

original: Nahetuṁ naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā hetu appamāṇa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With a condition that is not a root cause and that has an immeasurable object as condition there arises an element that is a root cause and that has an immeasurable object. (In brief.) With a root cause there are three. … With an unobscured neutral element there are three.
